answers.answer: I have been on bed rest for almost 4 weeks now. I went into preterm labor just shy of 23 weeks. I find myself watching tv, reading, napping, and trying to crochet.Good luck to making it to 36 weeks.

If you don't mind me asking, what made you go into preterm labor ?? I'm 22 weeks with baby girl #4 and VERY uncomfortable. It's so different from my last 3 pregnancies. Pelvic bone pain, lower abdomen pain, lower back pain..

I got a terrible UTI and I didn't even know I had one until I went into labor. My doctor said if I had waited a little longer and hadn't gone into labor I would have been septic. :/ but the week before I went to the hospital I had been cramping and having a lot of BH.
@missjoh how long are you on bed rest?

I was on bedrest with my first from 28wks but was so I'll I just slept a lot. This one I've been on bedrest since 27wks, now 32wks, I've been watching a lot of tv, reading this forum, playing candy crush. It's pretty boring and lonely but as my dr says its a lot better then being on strict bed rest in hospital.
@bittybean how did they found out u had UTI?
@SD_CALI They did a urine culture when I went into labor
I had no symptoms of a UTI. I didn't even feel sick.
Try scrapbooking, make a memory book for your baby. Invite famiky and  friends over often to keep you company, you going to need lots of help around the house.

I am only 13 weeks and have been on bed rest from 6 weeks. I will most likely be on some form of modified to strict bed rest all of this pregnancy. Learn some new craft's, read book's, make a memory book, play games, watch movie's, sign up for all the free baby stuff. Watch tv, make a baby blanket, make some baby clothes, if you haven't made a registry make one online.
I am on bed rest for the remainder of my pregnancy. The goal is to make it to 34 weeks but they don't want me to go beyond 37 weeks. 8 more weeks to go!

I am 21 weeks and was placed on bed rest due to my cervix funneling, it was being held closed by 4mm. So I now have a stitch in my cervix and will be on bed rest the remainder of my pregnancy because I am now viewed as high risk pregnancy. They would like me to make it to 32 weeks at least, but anything more is of course better! Good luck to all you ladies :)
@bittybean does the UTI Shows up in the urine test they take when you go to the clinic

I've been on bed rest since 23 weeks and now I'm 31 weeks. Definitely gets boring! I have made a baby book and scrapbook. Since I'm a high risk pregnancy I get a lot of ultrasounds so lots of pictures to scrapbook! Also youtubed how to make baby beanies and blankets.

I've been on bed rest for almost 3 weeks now. I am at 29 weeks and we are hoping to get me to 37 weeks. I have preeclampsia which is why I have to do it. I get extremely boted, even with my 3 older kids around. I watch TV play games and sleep a lot.

question: Im 26 weeks and have been on bed rest for almost 2 weeks now from going into preterm labor and i will be on it till 36 weeks. So I was wondering if anyone else is on bed rest and if you are what you do to pass the time. I find myself getting depressed and lonely and I need to find things to do.
title: Bed rest
